select tv.id as video_id ,tv.channel_id as video_channel_id ,tv.video_tags ,tv.video_description ,tv.video_thumbnail ,tv.video_path ,DATE_FORMAT(tv.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as video_created_at
,( select sum(judge_score_1+judge_score_2+judge_score_3) from tb_video_judge tvj where tvj.video_id = tv.id and DATE_FORMAT(tvj.judge_date, '%Y-%m') between DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m') ) as video_score
,( select sum(judge_score_1+judge_score_2+judge_score_3) from tb_video_judge tvj where tvj.video_id = tv.id and DATE_FORMAT(tvj.judge_date, '%Y-%m-%d') between DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') ) as video_score
,(select count(twpul.id) from tb_winning_prediction_user_list twpul where twpul.prediction_type = #{predictionType} and twpul.video_id = tv.id and DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') = twpul.start_date and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') = twpul.end_date ) as pred_cnt ,tc.name as channel_name ,tv.flag_use from tb_video tv inner join tb_channel tc on tv.channel_id = tc.id
DATE_FORMAT(tv.created_at, '%Y-%m') between DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(tv.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') between DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by video_score desc

select tv.id as video_id ,tv.channel_id as video_channel_id ,tv.video_tags ,tv.video_description ,tv.video_thumbnail ,tv.video_path ,DATE_FORMAT(tv.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') as video_created_at
,( SELECT sum(judge_score_1+judge_score_2+judge_score_3) FROM tb_video_judge tvj WHERE tvj.video_id = tv.id AND DATE_FORMAT(tvj.judge_date, '%Y-%m') between DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m') ) as video_score
,( SELECT sum(judge_score_1) FROM tb_video_judge tvj WHERE tvj.video_id = tv.id AND DATE_FORMAT(tvj.judge_date, '%Y-%m') between DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m') ) as video_score
,( SELECT sum(judge_score_2) FROM tb_video_judge tvj WHERE tvj.video_id = tv.id AND DATE_FORMAT(tvj.judge_date, '%Y-%m') between DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m') ) as video_score
,( SELECT sum(judge_score_3) FROM tb_video_judge tvj WHERE tvj.video_id = tv.id AND DATE_FORMAT(tvj.judge_date, '%Y-%m') between DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m') ) as video_score
,( SELECT count(tvj.id) FROM tb_video_judge tvj WHERE tvj.video_id = tv.id AND DATE_FORMAT(tvj.judge_date, '%Y-%m') between DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m') ) as video_score_cnt ,(select count(twpul.id) from tb_winning_prediction_user_list twpul where twpul.prediction_type = #{predictionType} and twpul.video_id = tv.id and DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') = twpul.start_date and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') = twpul.end_date ) as pred_cnt ,tc.name as channel_name ,tv.flag_use from tb_video tv inner join tb_channel tc on tv.channel_id = tc.id where DATE_FORMAT(tv.created_at, '%Y-%m') between DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m')
order by video_score desc limit 0,10

select tv.id as video_id ,tv.channel_id as video_channel_id ,tv.video_tags ,tv.video_description ,tv.video_thumbnail ,tv.video_path ,twl.total_score_1 ,twl.total_score_2 ,twl.total_score_3 ,twl.judge_cnt ,tc.name as channel_name ,tv.flag_use ,twl.week_idx from tb_winner_list twl inner join tb_video tv on twl.video_id = tv.id inner join tb_channel tc on tv.channel_id = tc.id where DATE_FORMAT(twl.win_date, '%Y') = #{sYear} and twl.prediction_type = 'W' order by twl.week_idx desc
